text: You may not be able to read a doctor's handwriting and prescription, but you'll notice his bills are neatly typewritten.
author: Earl Wilson

text: Modern medicine is a negation of health. It isn't organized to serve human health, but only itself, as an institution. It makes more people sick than it heals.
author: Ivan Illich

text: Whenever a doctor cannot do good, he must be kept from doing harm.
author: Hippocrates

text: The best doctor is the one you run to and can't find.
author: Denis Diderot

text: I was going to have cosmetic surgery until I noticed that the doctor's office was full of portraits by Picasso.
author: Rita Rudner
